title: Batman: Arkham Knight – Premium Edition – v1.6.2.0 + All DLCs
body:
Batman: Arkham Knight – Premium Edition – v1.6.2.0 + All DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Open world, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Rocksteady Studios, Iron Galaxy Studios, Warner Bros.
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI10
Original Size: 67.6 GB
Repack Size: 26.9/27 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only] (ALL voiceovers)
  • RuTor [magnet] (ENG voiceovers only)
  • FreeTorrents (ENG voiceovers only)
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] (ENG voiceovers only)
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) (ALL voiceovers)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc [Single Direct Link] (Upto 100MB/s, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
No new content in this repack. I only reduced the size by 2 GB while keeping the same installation time.

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Batman.Arkham.Knight.READ.NFO-CPY ISO release: cpy-bak.iso (72,617,965,568 bytes)
  • All released DLCs included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading/installing unnecessary voiceovers packs
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 67.6 to 26.9/27 GB for any single language)
  • Installation takes 40-90 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 52~68 GB (depending on selected languages)
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game “Binaries\Win64” folder to change the game language
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Repack uses pZlib library by Razor12911

Game Description

Batman™: Arkham Knight brings the award-winning Arkham trilogy from Rocksteady Studios to its epic conclusion. Developed exclusively for New-Gen platforms, Batman: Arkham Knight introduces Rocksteady’s uniquely designed version of the Batmobile. The highly anticipated addition of this legendary vehicle, combined with the acclaimed gameplay of the Arkham series, offers gamers the ultimate and complete Batman experience as they tear through the streets and soar across the skyline of the entirety of Gotham City. In this explosive finale, Batman faces the ultimate threat against the city that he is sworn to protect, as Scarecrow returns to unite the super criminals of Gotham and destroy the Batman forever.

Included DLCs:

  • 1970s Batman Themed Batmobile Skin
  • 1989 Movie Batmobile Pack
  • 2008 Movie Batman Skin
  • 2008 Tumbler Batmobile Pack
  • 2016 Batman v Superman Batmobile Pack
  • A Flip of a Coin
  • A Matter of Family
  • Bat-Family Skin Pack
  • Batman 1st Appearance Skin
  • Batman Classic TV Series Batmobile Pack
  • Batman Flashpoint Skin
  • Batman: Inc. Skin
  • Batman: Noel Skin
  • Catwoman’s Revenge
  • Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #1
  • Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #2
  • Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #3
  • Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #4
  • Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #5
  • Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #6
  • GCPD Lockdown
  • Gotham’s Future Skin Pack
  • Harley Quinn Story Pack
  • New 52 Skins Pack
  • Original Arkham Batman Skin
  • Original Arkham Batmobile
  • Prototype Batmobile Skin
  • Red Hood Story Pack
  • Riddler Themed Batmobile Skin
  • Robin and Batmobile Skins Pack
  • Rocksteady Themed Batmobile Skin
  • Season of Infamy: Most Wanted Expansion
  • Season Pass
  • WayneTech Track Pack

You can skip downloading of voiceover files you don’t need. Here is the list of selective files:

  • setup-fitgirl-selective-english.bin (must be downloaded and installed by English, Russian, Korean and Polish users)
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-brazilian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-french.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-german.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-italian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-japanese.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-spanish.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-mexican.bin (Spanish Latin America)

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download [bsetup-fitgirl-selective-german.bin[/b] & all main files (01-06).

This repack IS PARTIALLY COMPATIBLE with my previous repack of BAK.

The following files didn’t change, allowing to save you up to 18.3 GB of traffic:

  • setup-fitgirl-03.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-english.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-brazilian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-french.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-german.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-italian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-japanese.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-spanish.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-mexican.bin

All other files have been changed.

If save files don’t work for you

Open CPY.ini, located in Game Folder\Binaries\Win64 witn any text editor
and set new custom path in string: SavePath=%DEFAULT_CPY_DIR%
In example: SavePath=C:\BAK_Saves\

Also make sure you have indexing turned ON for folder with saves.
